Content: Good app but I see a bug. After installing the app, I bought pro version to change lock screen wallpaper as well but that doesn't work. Also, when I click on Settings -> Display -> Wallpaper ; the settings window crashes.
You know, it just works, and does it fine. I like that. No bugs, no crashes. It just does its job.
Great app but sometimes the app crashes and asks to send an error report. Then the app will not change daily
